text: Charlie Leland Rowland (July 23, 1899, Warrenton, North Carolina—January 21, 1992, Raleigh, North Carolina) was an American Major League Baseball catcher. He played for the Philadelphia Athletics during the season. ==References== ==External links== Category:Major League Baseball catchers Category:Philadelphia Athletics players Category:Baseball players from North Carolina Category:People from Warrenton, North Carolina Category:1899 births Category:1992 deaths
title: Chuck Rowland
